resources.string: Game over condition must be between

This is a freeware that used to improve the minesweeper player's capability of judgement.

Present by Crazyks, 2013.

The rule is very simple.
You should make a decision about the board is clear or not in a limited time.
If timeout, the round will be considered as lose and get into the next round.
If all the rounds are finished and the wrong rate is not over the limit, you win.
Otherwise, you lose.

There are 5 modes that you can choose.
*Easy: timeout limit is 2000 milliseconds.
*Normal: timeout limit is 1200 milliseconds.
*Hard: timeout limit is 800 milliseconds.
*Custom: you can change the timeout limit.
*Study: no timeout limit.

Besides, there is a switch to set the "Enhanced" status.
If "Enhanced" is on, you must judge if the whole board(7x7) is clear or not.
If "Enhanced" is off, you should only judge the center board(3x3) is clear or not.

BTW, Only after "Enhanced" is chosen, you can choose "Mark It".
When "Mark It" is chosen and the current board is not clear. After you made a right choice about the board is clear or not, you must mark the safety blocks before you get into the next round.
It's considered as a right choice if all the safety blocks are marked, otherwise, it will be considered as a wrong one.

Good luck!
You made a wrong choice. Click me to enter the next round.
If all the safety blocks are marked, click me to enter the next round.

Intuition Trainer for Minesweeper

Author: crazyks
Email: crazyks@yeah.net
Shenzhen, Guangdong, China
2013.03

100% correct in the hard mode with 50 rounds at least.
